name: Willow the Wisp
description:
" Willow the Wisp" is a runner where you can play as little will o' wisp called Willow. This cute creature goes on a long journey but to survive, it has to fuel its own flame and it can't do it alone! Are you ready to help it ?

FEATURES

  • The cutest creature that you’ve seen in a runner!   
  • A magical and immersive world that you don’t want to leave.
  • A unique way of playing which challenge you every second.Keep Willow fueled or increase your score, you’ll have to choose.
  • Every time you change worlds, new obstacles!New challenges! Would you able to see all of them?

 This game was designed for mobile devices but you can still download it on your PC.

          It's a student project, made in E-ARTSUP.

          Loan HACCART: Game and Level designer/Programmer.

         Sofiane TERON: Game and Level designer/Sound Designer.

         Jamie GALIOTO: Graphic designer/Concept Artist.

         Edo: Graphic designer / Animator/Concept Artist.
